name: Iron Blade
desc: A powerful greatsword that is difficult to wield.

name: Steel Blade
desc: A powerful greatsword that is difficult to wield.

name: Silver Blade
desc: A powerful greatsword that is difficult to wield.

name: Rapier
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Colichemarde
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Reginleif
desc: Effective against horseback and armoured units.

name: Siegmund
desc: Ephraim only. Strength +5. Effective against monsters.

name: Swordslayer
desc: Reverses the weapon triangle. Effective against sword fighters.

name: Physic
desc: Restores an ally's HP from afar.

name: Fortify
desc: Restores (User's Magic + 10) HP to all allies within range.

name: Trade
desc: Trade with a far away ally.

name: Unlock
components: region.nid.startswith('Door') or region.nid.endswith('Door') or region.nid.startswith('Chest') or region.nid.endswith('Chest')

name: Silence
desc: Enemy is rendered unable to use magic.
components: unit.wexp['Light'] or unit.wexp['Anima'] or unit.wexp['Dark'] or unit.wexp['Staff']

name: Hammerne
desc: Repair an item to full uses.

name: Rescue
desc: Bring an ally to a space adjacent to the user

name: Warp
desc: Move an ally to another square.

name: Latona
desc: Restores HP and condition of all allied units

name: Nosferatu
desc: User recovers HP equal to damage dealt.

name: Nightmare
desc: Sends all enemies in range 3 to sleep

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Angelic Robe
desc: Permanently raises maximum HP by 7 points.

name: Metis's Tome
desc: Permanently raises all of the user's growth rates by 5.

name: Delphi Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

name: Hoplon Guard
desc: User is immune to critical attacks.

name: Durandal
desc: The Blazing Sword. Increases strength by 5 pts.

name: Maltet
desc: The Blizzard Spear. Increases skill by 5 pts.

name: Armads
desc: The Thunder Axe. Increases defense by 5 pts.

name: Mulagir
desc: The Bow of the Winds. Increases speed by 5 pts.

name: Forblaze
desc: The Infernal Truth. Increases luck by 5 pts.

name: Aureola
desc: The Glorious Ascension. Increases resistance by 5 pts.

name: Apocalypse
desc: The Elder Revelation. Increases magic by 5 pts.

name: Saint's Staff
desc: Restores all HP and condition of all allies.

name: Binding Blade
desc: The Sword of Seals. Increases Def and Res by 5 pts.

name: Binding Blade
desc: The Sword of Seals. Increases Def and Res by 5 pts.

name: Eckesachs
desc: Usable only by the King of Bern.

name: Divinestone
desc: Transforms Fae into a divine dragon.

name: Demonstone
desc: Transforms user into a demon dragon.

name: Member Card
desc: If someone with this card stops in a suspicious place...

name: Silver Card
desc: A special card that reduces the cost of all items by half.

name: Giant's Shield
desc: Negates effective bonus of armor-piercing weapons towards user.

name: Torch
desc: Increases user's sight range in fog of war

name: Blizzard
desc: Long-range ice magic. Damages units in 1-tile wide cross on the target. Can harm allies.
